flashlights.name: Flashlight
flashlights.description:
A standard Flashlight.
Can be used to light your way in the darkness.
  • 8 Charges, allowing for a Battery Life of 8 seconds.
  • Can be used to temporarily blind the Killer.

"Most of the battery life was wastefully used by the previous owner."

flashlights.name: Sport Flashlight
flashlights.description:
A very portable Flashlight with a good grip.
Its efficient technology produces a powerful light while consuming less power.
  • 8 Charges, allowing for a Battery Life of 8 seconds.
  • Can be used to temporarily blind the Killer.
  • Increased Aim accuracy of +20 %.
  • Decreased Battery Depletion rate of -11 %.

flashlights.name: Utility Flashlight
flashlights.description:
A sturdy but heavy Flashlight that packs a lot of power.
  • 12 Charges, allowing for a Battery Life of 12 seconds.
  • Can be used to temporarily blind the Killer.
  • Increased Beam brightness of +30 %.
  • Increased Blindness duration of +15 %.
  • Reduced Aim accuracy of -20 %.

flashlights.name: Will O' Wisp
flashlights.description:
NO LONGER AVAILABLE IN THE BLOODWEB.

A Flashlight equipped with a special lens cover that adds an orange tint and a little Ghost to the beam.

  • 8 Charges, allowing for a Battery Life of 8 seconds.
  • Can be used to temporarily blind the Killer.
  • Morefriendly Ghosts in your life.

"Happy Trick or Treating!"

flashlights.name: Anniversary Flashlight
flashlights.description:
NO LONGER AVAILABLE IN THE BLOODWEB.

A festive Flashlight.

  • 8 Charges, allowing for a Battery Life of 8 seconds.
  • Can be used to temporarily blind the Killer.
    • Explodes with confetti upon blinding the Killer.
      Surprise!

""Happy Anniversary! Here is to many more!" — The Dead by Daylight Team"

flashlights.name: Masquerade Flashlight
flashlights.description:
Not even a mask can protect you from this Flashlight's bright beam.
  • 8 Charges, allowing for a Battery Life of 8 seconds.
  • Can be used to temporarily blind the Killer.

""Happy Anniversary! The future looks bright!" — The Dead by Daylight Team"

keys.name: Broken Key
keys.description:
The bow and shank of a key, vibrating with remnant power.
The Broken Key's power cannot be triggered by itself.

Various objects can be attached to its jump ring, which channels the Broken Key's power into various effects.

Press the Use Item button to perform the Mind Channel Action for up to 10 seconds.

  • Activates the Broken Key's Aura-reading abilities, depending on its equipped Add-ons.

keys.name: Dull Key
keys.description:
A bent and dull Key that once held great power.
The Dull Key's power cannot be triggered by itself.

Various objects can be attached to its jump ring, which channels the Dull Key's power into various effects.

Press the Use Item button to perform the Mind Channel Action for up to 5 seconds.

  • Activates the Dull Key's Aura-reading abilities, depending on its equipped Add-ons.

The Dull Key can be consumed to open the Hatch, if it has not been depleted of its Charges.

keys.name: Skeleton Key
keys.description:
A tarnished and crooked Key, vibrating with ominous power.
The Skeleton Key's power cannot be triggered by itself.

Various objects can be attached to its jump ring, which channels the Skeleton Key's power into various effects.

Press the Use Item button to perform the Mind Channel Action for up to 30 seconds.

  • Activates the Skeleton Key's Aura-reading abilities, depending on its equipped Add-ons.

The Skeleton Key can be consumed to open the Hatch, if it has not been depleted of its Charges.

maps.name: Map
maps.description:
An old piece of parchment made out of a skin-like material that is rolled and sealed with an uncoloured leather string.

Holding and channelling the Map unlocks great potential in your Aura-reading abilities, revealing the Aura of all tracked objects at the cost of slowly burning it.

  • Start the Trial with 1 Generator tracked.

The Map tracks any of the following objects:

  • Generators within 8 metres.
  • Generators, Chest, and Totem revealed by Detective's Hunch.

The Map lasts for 20 seconds.

maps.name: Rainbow Map
maps.description:
An piece of parchment made out of oddly fresh skin with blood on its edge that has yet to dry, and that is rolled and sealed with multiple coloured ropes and cords.

Holding and channelling the Rainbow Map unlocks great potential in your Aura-reading abilities, revealing the Aura of all tracked objects at the cost of slowly burning it.

  • Start the Trial with 3 random objects tracked.

The Rainbow Map tracks any of the following objects:

  • Exit Gate Switches, Generators, and the Hatch when you come within 8 metres.
  • Various Killer Belongings when you come within 8 metres.
  • Generators, Chests, and Totems revealed by Detective's Hunch.

The Rainbow Map lasts for 20 seconds.

"It disheartens me. All this unspeakable knowledge and gruelling effort and yet nothing tangible, nothing usable to get out of this nightmare." — Vigo's Journal

med-kits.name: Camping Aid Kit
med-kits.description:
A rudimentary First Aid Kit which can save lives in emergencies, even if it's lacking some of its supplies.
Can be used to heal other Survivors:
  • Increased Altruistic Healing speed of +35 %.

Unlocks the Self-Heal action:

  • Reduced Personal Healing speed of -33 %.
  • Reduced Item efficiency of -33 %.

The Camping Aid Kit has a Capacity of 24 Charges.

"Barely has enough material for a decent patch-up."

med-kits.name: First Aid Kit
med-kits.description:
A standard First Aid Kit with all the necessary equipment for treating common to more serious injuries.
Can be used to heal other Survivors:
  • Increased Altruistic Healing speed of +40 %.

Unlocks the Self-Heal action:

  • Reduced Personal Healing speed of -33 %.
  • Reduced Item efficiency of -33 %.

The First Aid Kit has a Capacity of 24 Charges.

med-kits.name: Emergency Med-Kit
med-kits.description:
A sturdy and well organised Med-Kit equipped with top condition emergency supplies.
Can be used to heal other Survivors:
  • Increased Altruistic Healing speed of +45 %.

Unlocks the Self-Heal action:

  • Reduced Personal Healing speed of -33 %.
  • Reduced Item efficiency of -33 %.

The Emergency Med-Kit has a Capacity of 24 Charges.

"There is a cure for almost everything...but not for this."

med-kits.name: Ranger Med-Kit
med-kits.description:
A large metal box containing medical supplies aimed at emergency rescues in hard to reach, often isolated locations.
Can be used to heal other Survivors:
  • Increased Altruistic Healing speed of +50 %.

Unlocks the Self-Heal action:

  • Reduced Personal Healing speed of -33 %.
  • Reduced Item efficiency of -33 %.

The Ranger Med-Kit has a Capacity of 24 Charges.

"A small engraved label can be found glued to the back panel: VK.ID-3994723."

med-kits.name: All Hallows' Eve Lunchbox
med-kits.description:
NO LONGER AVAILABLE IN THE BLOODWEB.

A plastic lunchbox with phosphorescent Halloween Stickers that has been packed with First-Aid equipment.

  • Makes you considerably more visible.

Can be used to heal other Survivors:

  • Increased Altruistic Healing speed of +40 %.

Unlocks the Self-Heal action:

  • Reduced Personal Healing speed of -33 %.
  • Reduced Item efficiency of -33 %.

The All Hallows' Eve Lunchbox has a Capacity of 24 Charges.

"Safety first! Make sure you can be seen when trick or treating."

med-kits.name: Anniversary Med-Kit
med-kits.description:
NO LONGER AVAILABLE IN THE BLOODWEB.

A festive Med-Kit that explodes with confetti upon fully healing a Survivor. Surprise!

  • Increased confetti of +100 %.

Can be used to heal other Survivors:

  • Increased Altruistic Healing speed of +40 %.

Unlocks the Self-Heal action:

  • Reduced Personal Healing speed of -33 %.
  • Reduced Item efficiency of -33 %.

The Anniversary Med-Kit has a Capacity of 24 Charges.

"Happy Anniversary! Here's to many more!" — The Dead by Daylight Team

med-kits.name: Masquerade Med-Kit
med-kits.description:
A festive Med-Kit with a shocking surprise, giving a whole new meaning to the term "Health Scare".
  • Increased confetti of +100 %.

Can be used to heal other Survivors:

  • Increased Altruistic Healing speed of +40 %.

Unlocks the Self-Heal action:

  • Reduced Personal Healing speed of -33 %.
  • Reduced Item efficiency of -33 %.

The Masquerade Med-Kit has a Capacity of 24 Charges.

"Happy Anniversary! To your health!" — The Dead by Daylight Team

toolboxes.name: Worn-Out Tools
toolboxes.description:
A metal box containing out of condition tools that could break at any moment.
Even without training, can be used to repair or break various mechanical components.
  • Increased Generator Repair speed of +50 %.
  • Reduced Good Skill Check Success zone of -10 %.
  • Unlocks the Sabotage action.

The Worn-Out Toolbox has a Capacity of 16 Charges.

"You call these tools? ... Really?"

toolboxes.name: Toolbox
toolboxes.description:
A metal box containing a set of basic tools.
Even without training, can be used to repair or break various mechanical components.
  • Increased Generator Repair speed of +50 %.
  • Unlocks the Sabotage action.
  • Increased Hook Sabotage speed of +10 %.

The Toolbox has a Capacity of 20 Charges.

"It is unclear as to where these tools come from. Were they brought in by one of us or did they belong to one of the monsters?"

toolboxes.name: Mechanic's Toolbox
toolboxes.description:
A metal box with specialised mechanics tools.
Even without training, can be used to repair or break various mechanical components.
  • Increased Generator Repair speed of +75 %.
  • Unlocks the Sabotage action.
  • Decreased Hook Sabotage speed of -10 %.

The Mechanic's Toolbox has a Capacity of 16 Charges.

toolboxes.name: Commodious Toolbox
toolboxes.description:
A large metal box containing basic tool and extra mechanical parts.
Even without training, can be used to repair or break various mechanical components.
  • Increased Generator Repair speed by +50 %.
  • Unlocks the Sabotage action.

The Commodious Toolbox has a Capacity of 32 Charges.

toolboxes.name: Engineer's Toolbox
toolboxes.description:
A metal box with highly specialised tools meant for engineering.
Most of the tools can be used by neophytes to make quick repairs or break various mechanical components.
  • Increased Generator Repair speed of +100 %.
  • Unlocks the Sabotage action.
  • Decreased Hook Sabotage speed of -25 %.

The Engineer's Toolbox has a Capacity of 16 Charges.

"I've created tools beyond compare and stood paralysed as they were stolen from me. These are but a poor replica, spat out by The Fog." — Vigo's Journal

toolboxes.name: Alex's Toolbox
toolboxes.description:
A metal box containing mainly saws and vice grips of varying sizes but also other tools.
Even though the content of this Toolbox is clearly aimed at destructive deeds, it can be used to repair various mechanical components as well.
  • Increased Generator Repair speed of +10 %.
  • Unlocks the Sabotage action.
  • Increased Hook Sabotage speed of +50 %.

Alex's Toolbox has a Capacity of 24 Charges.

"Most of the tools are identified as 'owned by Alex'."

toolboxes.name: Anniversary Toolbox
toolboxes.description:
NO LONGER AVAILABLE IN THE BLOODWEB.

A Toolbox that is slightly explosive.

  • Increased Generator Repair speed of +50 %.
  • Detonates a firework once depleted.
    Yay!
  • Unlocks the Sabotage action.

The Anniversary Toolbox has a Capacity of 32 Charges.

"Nothing says happy anniversary like detonating a firework and praying the Killer does not notice.
Good luck and thank you for celebrating with us!" — The Dead by Daylight Team

toolboxes.name: Festive Toolbox
toolboxes.description:
NO LONGER AVAILABLE IN THE BLOODWEB.

A Toolbox packed to the brim with fireworks, it is prepared to celebrate all your life's successes... and failures.

  • Increased Generator Repair speed of +50 %.
  • Succeeding a Great Skill Check detonates a small cluster of firecrackers.
  • Missing a Skill Check detonates fireworks.
  • Unlocks the Sabotage action.

The Festive Toolbox has a Capacity of 32 Charges.

toolboxes.name: Masquerade Toolbox
toolboxes.description:
A Toolbox with all of the standard gadgets: wrenches, screwdrivers, fireworks, a hammer...
  • Increased Generator Repair speed of +50 %.
  • Detonates a firework once depleted.
    Yay!
  • Unlocks the Sabotage action.

The Masquerade Toolbox has a Capacity of 32 Charges.

"Happy Anniversary! We're fixin' to have a big party!" — The Dead by Daylight Team

flashlight.name: Broken Bulb
flashlight.description:
NO LONGER AVAILABLE IN THE BLOODWEB

A damaged bulb that causes a spooky flickering effect.

  • Causes the Flashlight to flicker.
  • Increases the Beam brightness of the Flashlight by +15 %.
  • Increases the Blindness duration of the Flashlight by +30 %.
  • Increases the spookiness.

Haunted by Daylight Event Item.

flashlight.name: Wide Lens
flashlight.description:
A thin wide lens in perfect condition.
Designed to spread the Flashlight beam at the cost of reducing its range of effectiveness.
  • Increases the Beam width of the Flashlight by +25 %.
  • Shortens the Beam reach of the Flashlight by -25 %.

flashlight.name: Power Bulb
flashlight.description:
A tiny Flashlight bulb that packs more wattage for a brighter, more powerful light beam.
  • Increases the Beam brightness of the Flashlight by +20 %.
  • Increases the Blindness duration of the Flashlight by +10 %.

"Even the most powerful light cannot pierce through The Black Fog's darkness."

flashlight.name: Leather Grip
flashlight.description:
A leather strip wrapped around the Flashlight for more grip.
  • Increases the Aim accuracy of the Flashlight by +20 %.

"Too many have fallen due to sweaty hands."

flashlight.name: Battery
flashlight.description:
A standard battery of unknown brand.
  • Extends the Battery life of the Flashlight by +2 seconds.

"Another nearly empty battery."

flashlight.name: TIR Optic
flashlight.description:
A lens and reflector combo which can magnify a Flashlight's beam.
  • Increases the Beam brightness of the Flashlight by +30 %.
  • Increases the Blindness duration of the Flashlight by +15 %.

"Let the light burn them out of their dark shroud."

flashlight.name: Rubber Grip
flashlight.description:
A rubber grip specifically fitting Flashlights for more grip.
  • Increases the Aim accuracy of the Flashlight by +40 %.

flashlight.name: Low Amp Filament
flashlight.description:
A filament bulb designed to extend a Flashlight battery's life.
  • Decreases the Battery Depletion rate of the Flashlight by -20 %.

flashlight.name: Heavy Duty Battery
flashlight.description:
A battery marked as "industrial strength".
  • Extends the Battery life of the Flashlight by +4 seconds.

"A battery advertised as lasting 8 hours lasts only a couple of seconds in The Black Fog."

flashlight.name: Focus Lens
flashlight.description:
A thick glass lens that focuses the Flashlight beam to increase its intensity.
  • Extends the Beam reach of the Flashlight by +25 %.
  • Increases the Beam brightness of the Flashlight by +20 %.
  • Increases the Blindness duration of the Flashlight by +10 %.
  • Decreases the Beam width of the Flashlight by -15 %.

flashlight.name: Long Life Battery
flashlight.description:
A recent model of battery that lasts longer.
  • Extends the Battery life of the Flashlight by +6 seconds.

flashlight.name: Intense Halogen
flashlight.description:
A chemical bulb that generates an intensely clear light.
  • Increases the Beam brightness of the Flashlight by +40 %.
  • Increases the Blindness duration of the Flashlight by +20 %.

flashlight.name: High-End Sapphire Lens
flashlight.description:
A wide lens made of un-scratch-able sapphire that optimises the power and range of the light beam.
  • Extends the Beam reach of the Flashlight by +25 %.
  • Increases the Beam brightness of the Flashlight by +30 %.
  • Increases the Blindness duration of the Flashlight by +15 %.
  • Decreases the Beam width of the Flashlight by +25 %.

flashlight.name: Odd Bulb
flashlight.description:
A heavy and completely opaque bulb of unknown origin which emits a faint light even when turned off.
  • Increases the Beam brightness of the Flashlight by +50 %.
  • Increases the Blindness duration of the Flashlight by +25 %.
  • Increases the Battery Depletion rate of the Flashlight by +14 %.

key.name: Prayer Rope
key.description:
Tightly knitted rope used in praying rituals.
  • Adds 10 seconds of use to the Key.

"Pray all you want, your words are getting lost somewhere up there, in The Fog."

key.name: Scratched Pearl
key.description:
A porous and scratched white pearl.
A minuscule jump ring allows the pearl to be attached to the Key.
  • Increases the Key's Aura-reading range by +12 metres.

key.name: Prayer Beads
key.description:
A chain of matte beads of various sizes used in praying ritual.
  • Adds 15 seconds of use to the Key.

key.name: Eroded Token
key.description:
A heavily worn out token made of brass.
If an inscription or drawing was once engraved in it, it has today completely disappeared.
Can be attached to the Key using its jump ring to channel the Key's Aura-reading ability.
  • Unlocks the ability to reveal the Auras of other Survivors within 24 metres.

Does not stack with Gold Token.

key.name: Gold Token
key.description:
A gold token with a dull appearance.
Both faces are smooth and void of any inscriptions.
Can be attached to the Key using its jump ring to channel the Key's Aura-reading ability.
  • Unlocks the ability to reveal the Auras of other Survivors within 48 metres.

Does not stack with Eroded Token.

key.name: Weaved Ring
key.description:
A mundane key ring in appearance with an unusual bluish dark sheen.
The ring binds the Key to the user, preventing its loss even in the darkest of times.
  • In case of death, lose this Add-on instead of the Key itself.

key.name: Milky Glass
key.description:
This opaque piece of glass emits a dull vibrating noise.
When the Key is used to unlock the Hatch, the glass token protects the Key from breaking, channelling The Black Fog's energy into the glass instead.
  • Opening the Hatch with a Key loses this Add-on instead of the Key itself.

key.name: Blood Amber
key.description:
A blood-red amber striped with black veins.
The amber is warm to the touch.
Can be attached to the Key using its jump ring to channel the Key's Aura-reading ability.
  • Unlocks the ability to reveal the Aura of the Killer within 32 metres.
  • Increases the Key's Depletion rate by +100 %.

key.name: Unique Wedding Ring
key.description:
An engraved wedding ring that emerged from The Fog and resonates with an indescribable and incomprehensible energy.
  • Reveals the Aura of the Obsession at all times, without the need to channel the Key's energy.

Lowers the odds of becoming the Killer's initial Obsession by -100 %.

map.name: Map Addendum
map.description:
A fragmented piece of a thick fibrous material.
A partial and faded map is drawn on it which by itself is useless.
  • Adds 5 seconds of use to the Map.

map.name: Yellow Wire
map.description:
A small electrical wire.
Both ends are heavily damaged like it has been forcefully torn out of its intended location.
Can be tied around the Map to enhance its Aura-reading ability.
  • Unlocks the ability to track the Exit Gate Switches.

map.name: Unusual Stamp
map.description:
A wooden stamp with a cross-hatched rubber pad used to mark documents.
It is unclear as to how or by whom this stamp was originally used.
  • Increases the Map's Tracking range by +8 metres.

map.name: Retardant Jelly
map.description:
A slimy, translucent substance with a ghastly lavender shade.
This jelly from unknown origin is highly resistant to heat.
  • Decreases the Map's Depletion rate by -20 %.

map.name: Red Twine
map.description:
A bristly and rough piece of twine of a deep red colour.
Can be tied around the Map to enhance its Aura-reading ability.
  • Unlocks the ability to track Killer Belongings.

map.name: Glass Bead
map.description:
A strange bead circled with gold that can be used to magnify the map and mark a specific position.
The bead emits an energy which can be felt and seen by Survivors.

Press the Secondary Action button while using the Map to use the Glass Bead:

  • Place a Pillar of Light at your current location that can be seen by all Survivors.

map.name: Odd Stamp
map.description:
A stamp carved out of sturdy blonde wood.
The text found at the base is incomprehensible: "kw'zvre'od".
  • Increases the Map's Tracking range by +12 metres.

map.name: Black Silk Cord
map.description:
A smooth black cord with a soft appearance.
Can be tied around the Map to enhance its Aura-reading ability.
  • Unlocks the ability to track the Hatch.

map.name: Crystal Bead
map.description:
An intricate set of lenses wrapped up in an astonishingly complex apparatus.
The gears controlling the lenses' focus move by themselves as to focus on something invisible to humans.
  • Reveals the Auras generated by the Map to all Survivors.

med-kit.name: Refined Serum
med-kit.description:
NO LONGER AVAILABLE IN THE BLOODWEB

A refined version of the Putrid Serum that is mostly safe for human consumption.
Mostly.

Press the Secondary Action button while healing yourself or another Survivor with a Med-Kit to use the Refined Serum:

  • Increases the Movement speed of the affected Survivor by +5 % for the next 16 seconds.
  • Creates a Blight trail behind the affected Survivor.

Refined Serum consumes the Med-Kit on use.

Haunted by Daylight Event Item.

med-kit.name: Rubber Gloves
med-kit.description:
Disposable medical gloves to avoid cross-contamination.
  • Increases the Great Success zone of Healing Skill Checks by +10 %.

med-kit.name: Butterfly Tape
med-kit.description:
Medical quality tape used to close small wounds.
  • Increases the Healing speed of Med-Kits by +5 %.

med-kit.name: Bandages
med-kit.description:
A pack of bandages usually found in First Aid Kits.
  • Increases the Charges of Med-Kits by +8 Charges.

med-kit.name: Sponge
med-kit.description:
A mundane sponge used to soak up extra blood, providing easier access to wounds.
  • Increases the Great Success zone of Healing Skill Checks by +20 %.

med-kit.name: Self Adherent Wrap
med-kit.description:
A pack of bandages that stick to themselves without the need of clips for a faster patch-up that requires less readjustments.
  • Increases the Healing speed of Med-Kits by +5 %.
  • Increases the Charges of Med-Kits by +8 Charges.

med-kit.name: Needle & Thread
med-kit.description:
Not exactly a medical device.
However, it can be used to quickly and painfully close up a wound.
  • Increases the Odds of triggering Healing Skill Checks by +10 %.
  • Increases the Progression bonus for succeeding at Great Healing Skill Checks by +5 %.

med-kit.name: Medical Scissors
med-kit.description:
Scissors designed to easily cut through textiles.
  • Increases the Healing speed of Med-Kits by +10 %.

med-kit.name: Surgical Suture
med-kit.description:
A medical device used to close and hold body tissue.
Even though it is very effective, the surgical suture is challenging to use.
  • Increases the Odds of triggering Healing Skill Checks by +15 %.
  • Increases the Progression bonus for succeeding at Great Healing Skill Checks by +10 %.

med-kit.name: Gauze Roll
med-kit.description:
A sterile gauze used for a variety of wounds.
Part of a total wound care system.
  • Increases the Charges of Med-Kits by +10 Charges.

med-kit.name: Styptic Agent
med-kit.description:
A white powder with coagulant properties.
Apply the agent to a wound to stop it from haemorrhaging.

Press the Secondary Action button while healing yourself or another Survivor with a Med-Kit to use the Styptic Agent:

  • Grants the Endurance Status Effect for 5 seconds.

Styptic Agent consumes the Med-Kit on use.

med-kit.name: Abdominal Dressing
med-kit.description:
A highly absorbent pad that prevents bodily fluid leakage when applied to large abdominal wounds.
  • Increases the Healing speed of Med-Kits by +15 %.

med-kit.name: Gel Dressings
med-kit.description:
A pack of gel forming pads used to patch up heavily exuding wounds.
  • Increases the Charges of Med-Kits by +16 Charges.

med-kit.name: Anti-Haemorrhagic Syringe
med-kit.description:
An anti-haemorrhagic substance that stops the bleeding in a matter of seconds.

Press the Secondary Action button while healing yourself or another Survivor with a Med-Kit to use the Anti-Haemorrhagic Syringe:

  • Automatically heals the affected Survivor 1 Health State over the next 16 seconds.
    • Healing Speed modifiers affect the Healing time.
    • Taking damage or being picked up by the Killer cancels the Healing effect.

Anti-Haemorrhagic Syringe consumes the Med-Kit on use.

toolbox.name: Scraps
toolbox.description:
Springs, screws and gears.
Mostly unusable junk.
  • Increases the Capacity of the Toolbox by +8 charges.

toolbox.name: Instructions
toolbox.description:
Someone quickly painted what seems to be repair instructions on this piece of bark.
  • Suppresses all normal Skill Checks that are usually triggered while repairing a Generator.

toolbox.name: Clean Rag
toolbox.description:
A mundane rag.
Suspiciously clean.
  • Increases the Repair speed of the Toolbox by +20 %.

toolbox.name: Wire Spool
toolbox.description:
A portable but heavy spool of copper wire.
  • Increases the Capacity of the Toolbox by +12 charges.

toolbox.name: Spring Clamp
toolbox.description:
Useful tool to clamp hoses or hold wires in place and prevent damage or injury.
  • Reduces the range at which your Generator-Repair noises can be heard by -8 metres.

toolbox.name: Socket Swivels
toolbox.description:
Swivels provide bend and flexibility for bolts that are out of reach, deep within mechanical devices.
  • Increases the Repair speed of the Toolbox by +30 %.

toolbox.name: Protective Gloves
toolbox.description:
Thick gloves, which reduce manual dexterity but protect hands from injury.
  • Suppresses the Loud Noise Notification to the Killer that is usually triggered after sabotaging a Hook .

toolbox.name: Cutting Wire
toolbox.description:
A rudimentary cutting tool made from a jagged metal wire and two wooden handles.
  • Increases the Sabotage speed of the Toolbox by +15 %.

toolbox.name: Hacksaw
toolbox.description:
A small hand saw mounted with a metal cutting blade.
  • Increases the Sabotage speed of the Toolbox by +20 %.

toolbox.name: Grip Wrench
toolbox.description:
An adjustable wrench with a tough grip.
Essential in any Toolbox.
  • Increases the Auto-Repair timer for sabotaged Hooks by +15 seconds.

toolbox.name: Brand New Part
toolbox.description:
This intricate mechanical part feels oddly out of place.
It is clean and shiny as if straight out of the factory.

Replaces the Toolbox Repair prompt with an Install Brand New Part prompt instead:

  • Installing the Brand New Part triggers 1 difficult Skill Check.
  • Reduces that Generator's Repair requirement permanently by -10 Charges after succeeding the Skill Check.

Brand New Part is consumed on use.
